entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is described as pulling her shawls tight about her with slightly trembling hands and surveying the class through her hugely magnifying lenses. She is also mentioned as making a brave attempt at her usual mystic tones, though her voice shook slightly.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is described as sitting right beside Professor Trelawney's seat and making notes on her clipboard.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is mentioned as being in discussion with Lavender about Parvati's most recent dream.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned as being in discussion with Parvati about Parvati's most recent dream.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as opening his copy of The Dream Oracle and watching Umbridge covertly.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney is teaching the class and Parvati is one of her students.
Professor Umbridge is sitting right beside Professor Trelawney's seat.
Parvati and Lavender are in discussion about Parvati's most recent dream.
Harry is watching Professor Umbridge covertly.
